hashtag#hiringhashtag#Internship🚀We’re hiring a QA Intern!Love spotting mistakes others miss? Enjoy breaking things just to fix them better? You might be just who we’re looking for.🛠️ What you'll be doing:1. Understand product features and write test cases2. Perform manual testing (functional, regression, etc.)3. Assist in writing basic automated scripts (Selenium or similar)4. Log and document bugs, and help with test reporting5. Work closely with developers and product managers6. Join daily standups and sprint reviews to see how agile teams work✅ What we’re looking for:1. Background in Computer Science or Engineering (or pursuing final year)2. Good understanding of QA/testing concepts3. Familiarity with web/mobile apps and REST APIs4. Basic knowledge of SQL and Git5. Attention to detail, curiosity, and willingness to learn🌟 Nice to have (but not a must):1. Exposure to Selenium or any automation tool2. Hands-on with Postman or any API testing tool3. Knowledge of CI/CD tools like Jenkins💼 What you’ll get:1. Paid internship with certificate2. Real project experience3. Mentorship from experienced QA professionals4. High chance of full-time conversion (based on performance)📬 Ready to kickstart your QA journey?Send in your resume tochetan@konnectnxt.comKnow someone who fits? “This Ain’t Broadway.”Dear companies: If your job posting is just for show, please take it to Broadway. 🎤🎭We love performative hiring... said no one ever.Here’s how it goes:You post an opening.Dozens of qualified people apply.A few even make it to interviews.Then... radio silence.Turns out:🔹 The role was already filled.🔹 You just needed to prove to leadership you were “looking.”🔹 Or you were “building a talent pipeline.” (Translation: wasting people’s time.)This isn’t a scavenger hunt, it’s someone’s career.Job seekers are out here prepping portfolios, taking time off for interviews, and emotionally investing—while some orgs are just playing hiring dress-up.⚠️ If you’re not ready to hire, don’t post.⚠️ If the position isn’t real, don’t advertise it.⚠️ If it’s unpaid “experience,” just say you’re looking for free labor and let us judge you accordingly.Let’s keep it real out here. The job market is hard enough without the gaslighting.#LinkedInSoapbox#JobSearchReality#SassyLinkedIn#HiringEtc Shambhavi ThakurShambhavi Thakur “This Ain’t Broadway.”Dear companies: If your job posting is just for show, please take it to Broadway. 🎤🎭We love performative hiring... said no one ever.Here’s how it goes:You post an opening.Dozens of qualified people apply.A few even make it to interviews.Then... radio silence.Turns out:🔹 The role was already filled.🔹 You just needed to prove to leadership you were “looking.”🔹 Or you were “building a talent pipeline.” (Translation: wasting people’s time.)This isn’t a scavenger hunt, it’s someone’s career.Job seekers are out here prepping portfolios, taking time off for interviews, and emotionally investing—while some orgs are just playing hiring dress-up.⚠️ If you’re not ready to hire, don’t post.⚠️ If the position isn’t real, don’t advertise it.⚠️ If it’s unpaid “experience,” just say you’re looking for free labor and let us judge you accordingly.Let’s keep it real out here. ⚠️ If you don’t understand the value of a Social Media Manager, you shouldn’t be hiring one.They’re not here to “just post.”They build brand trust in public.They handle firestorms with DMs.They turn content into community — in real time.You think it’s easy?Try being the voice of a brand that doesn’t even know what it stands for yet.A good SMM doesn’t need micromanagement.They need support.They need clear goals.They need you to stop treating them like an intern with Canva access.It’s Monday.Put respect on the role — or expect your brand to stay invisible. ✨ "Build AI that feels like magic, pitch like a boss, vibe like a meme — this is not your boring internship." 💥🚀SG Consultingis Hiring Interns! 🚀Shape the future of AI with us — and have some fun along the way. We’re on the lookout for bold, curious minds to join our Summer Internship Program across the following roles:💡 1. AI Engineer InternGet hands-on building real-world AI products, from recommendation engines to LLM-powered tools. Python, APIs, and AI infra will be your playground.🧠 2. AI Research InternExplore cutting-edge research in GenAI, prompt engineering, and ML model tuning. If you love papers with code, we already love you.🎧 3. Vibe Engineer InternYou're the pulse. From designing micro-moments in product UX to dropping the perfect emoji in a client pitch, you bring soul to the stack. If you believe vibes can be coded, this is your call.📈 4. Business Development - AI Services InternYou’ll help us grow fast. Think client outreach, proposals, market research, and crafting narratives that sell the future of AI.📍 Remote-friendly📅 Duration: 3-4 weeks📨 Apply by sending your resume + a short note on why you’re excited about any of these roles tohiring@sgconsultingtech.comorceo@sgconsultingtech.comAt SG Consulting, we don’t just follow trends — we build what’s next. ✨ I’m hiring! ✨I’m looking for a curious, creative, and culturally sharp intern to join my team atThe Social Wire - Groupe EDGin Paris.We’re on the hunt for a Qualitative & Trends Analyst Intern who’s passionate about what’s next in beauty, skincare, food, and lifestyle. In this role, you’ll dig into emerging trends, interview experts and influencers, and help turn insights into action for some of the world’s most exciting brands.This is a full-time, hybrid role—perfect for a student or recent grad who’s fluent in English, loves research, and wants to work at the intersection of culture and product innovation.📍 Based in Paris🗂️ Real projects, real clients, real impact📩 Sound like someone you know? 𝐋𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐲, 𝐫𝐞𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐡𝐢𝐭 𝐝𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐥𝐲.I’m not someone chasing quick wins or “hopping around.” I’m looking for one team — a place I can grow with, contribute to meaningfully, and truly commit to for the long run.Yes, I know short stints can raise eyebrows. But behind the scenes, I’ve been all in — building, learning, improving every single day. I’m not looking for the next big thing. I’m looking for my thing.Still, the inbox keeps filling up with “We regret to inform you…”It stings. But I’m still here. Still hopeful. Still ready to give my best to a workplace that values potential, consistency, and heart.If you’re in this phase too, I hope this reminds you: you’re not alone.And if you’re hiring — I’d love to connect.(𝘐’𝘷𝘦 𝘸𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘧 𝘴𝘩𝘢𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘮𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘵 𝘣𝘦 𝘫𝘶𝘥𝘨𝘦𝘥. 🌐 The Current State of the IT Industry – A Reality Check 💻In recent times, the Information Technology field has seen massive shifts. While technology continues to evolve rapidly with innovations in AI, cloud computing, and automation, the job market tells a different story. Layoffs, project freezes, and slow hiring processes are making headlines far too often. 📉🚨 On the darker side, there has been a noticeable rise in job scams targeting desperate candidates. Fake consultancies, fraudulent offer letters, and scam interviews are taking advantage of job seekers, especially freshers. It's more important than ever to verify job postings and be cautious. 🕵️‍♂️🎓 Freshers are struggling the most. Despite having relevant skills and certifications, many are unable to find opportunities due to unrealistic job descriptions and high competition. The traditional “fresher hiring” cycle has slowed down, and many are waiting endlessly for onboarding or offer updates.🔍 It's time for the industry to reflect and act. Real talent deserves real chances. Companies need to prioritize ethical hiring, transparency, and inclusive growth. And as a community, we must support each other, guide freshers, and raise awareness about ongoing scams.💬 Let’s use this space to share resources, openings, or even encouragement. 🌟 Unlock Your Future in Sales – Join the Real Estate Game-Changers! 🌟🏢 ABOUT THE ROLEWe’re on the lookout for dynamic, driven, and ambitious Sales Professionals who are ready to make their mark in the ever-evolving real estate industry. I’m grateful to share that I’ve successfully  completed my internship at UNQUE Cloudbook Private Limited as a Software Developer Intern (Feb–May 2025)! 🚀During this journey, I had the opportunity to work closely with a talented and supportive team on a real-time salon queue management system. This hands-on experience deepened my understanding of full-stack development with technologies like React Native, Node.js, and MongoDB, while helping me grow professionally and personally.A heartfelt thank you toKrishna VamseeandAdarsh Vinay(Founders) and all my colleagues at UNQUE for their mentorship, trust, and continuous encouragement throughout the internship. Your guidance has truly shaped my learning experience and I’m incredibly grateful! 🙏I am also deeply thankful to my friends, especiallyImam Mohammad Abuturab, and my family for their constant support and encouragement throughout this journey. A special thanks toSatyam KumarBhaiya for his invaluable guidance and mentorship at every step. Your support has truly made a difference. 🙏🎯 What’s Next?As I transition into my 6th semester (starting June 20th), I’m currently focusing on reinforcing my core CS fundamentals:🔹 DBMS🔹 Operating Systems🔹 Computer Networks🔹 Data Structures & Algorithms🔹 JavaScript ConceptsI’m also actively preparing for my semester exams and continuing to work on building efficient, scalable systems.💼 Open to OpportunitiesI’m now open to Software Engineering and related roles where I can apply my skills, continue learning, and contribute to impactful projects. 🎓 Job Title: Stock/Inventory Manager📍 Location: Saket, New Delhi – 110030💼 Industry: Education | Food Industry🕒 Employment Type: Mon-Sat 10 am to 6 pm💰 Salary: ₹15,000 – ₹20,000 per monthJob Description:We are looking for a Stock/Inventory Manager to oversee and manage our inventory and stock operations at our Saket, Delhi location. This role is crucial in maintaining smooth day-to-day inventory flow in our bakery training institute.Key Responsibilities:1. Manage incoming and outgoing stock for ingredients, tools, and equipment2. Maintain accurate inventory records and update stock levels regularly3. Coordinate with chefs and trainers for stock requirements4. Ensure timely ordering and restocking of essential items5. Prepare stock usage reports and highlight discrepancies6. Maintain cleanliness and organization of the inventory area7. Use MS Word, Excel, and other tools for inventory tracking and reportingEligibility & Requirements:1. Must be from an HRM (Hotel/Restaurant Management) background or have knowledge of the food industry2. Male candidates preferred to apply for the nature of the job3. Experience: 0–2 years (freshers with relevant background/skills can apply)4. Must have good working knowledge of MS Word, Excel, and Office tools5. Must be able to speak and write in good English6. 📢 Now Hiring: Research Associate Interns (Founder’s Office)🌐 Remote Internship | June 2025 Cycle🗓️ Duration: June 2025 | Flexible Schedule✨ About the RoleJoin an elite, impact-driven internship opportunity offering a deep dive into:✅ Assisting a Member of Parliament (India)✅ Collaborating with Senior Counsels & Partners from the UK, USA, and India✅ Contributing to legal research, dispute resolution, GST & taxation, corporate publications, and public policy🎯 What We’re Looking For✔️ Exceptional legal research and analytical skills✔️ Strong communication and branding strategy abilities✔️ Active and engaging LinkedIn profile✔️ Interest in law, policy, corporate affairs, and strategic communication💼 Application Instructions🔹 For Individual Applicants– Ensure your LinkedIn profile is updated– If your LinkedIn is not active, you may email your CV to:📧gambit.enclave@gmail.com🔹 For Law College Placement CellsWe welcome institutional collaborations. Please email:📧gambit.enclave@gmail.comInclude:• College name• Internship expectations• Stipend range (if any)• Details of prior collaborations• Support needed from our sideWe value meaningful, impact-driven partnerships to promote legal and policy-focused growth.🚀 Let’s Skill Up Together— Powered by Skill Up LawyersLink: (https://lnkd.in/ga5f8emr)💬 Want more premium legal job updates?Join the Skill Up Lawyers WhatsApp Group:https://lnkd.in/gqWDSv34hashtag#SkillUpLawyershashtag#LetsSkillUpTogetherhashtag#LegalInternshiphashtag#RemoteInternshiphashtag#JuneInternshiphashtag#LawStudentshashtag#ResearchInternshiphashtag#PolicyInternshiphashtag#LinkedInLawyershashtag#LegalOpportunitieshashtag#LegalResearchhashtag#LawAndPolicyhashtag#CorporateLawInternshiphashtag#DisputeResolutionhashtag#LegalBrandinghashtag#LawCollegesIndiahashtag#FoundersOffice We are now looking for Research Associate Interns for the Founder’s Office with a remote presence (online) for the June 2025 internship cycle. This opportunity offers exposure to high-impact projects, including the chance to assist a Member of Parliament in India, and interact with Senior Counsels and Partners from top-tier law firms with a presence in the United Kingdom, USA, or India.This role involves work in the areas of GST, taxation, dispute resolution, corporate-based publications, and public policy initiatives. We are seeking candidates with exceptional legal research and analytical skills, proficiency in communication and branding strategies, and an active LinkedIn presence to engage with diverse content formats.If the placement cells of law colleges wish to collaborate with us, they are welcome to reach out by dropping an email togambit.enclave@gmail.com. Please ensure the email includes the name of the college, your key expectations from the internship, any stipend brackets (if applicable), details of any past associations, and a clear outline of the assistance you offer and the support you may require from our end. We look forward to building meaningful, impact-driven partnerships that align with the vision of legal and policy-oriented professional growth.For individual applicants kindly ensure your LinkedIn profile is fully updated and drop your comment on the post only if you wish to be considered further based on your LinkedIn profile. If you’ve already DM’d us your application, feel free to simply comment applied on the post. Adding your comment helps this post reach a wider audience, enabling more people to learn about the opportunity and ensures better visibility for our organization.If your LinkedIn is not an active representation of your work, you may email your CV togambit.enclave@gmail.com.We will close the applications by 02nd June, 2025. 🔁 The Hiring Dilemma: A Common Struggle for Job SeekersThese days, navigating interviews feels like walking a tightrope:📞 HR: "What’s your notice period?"💬 Me: "90 days."❌ Call ends.💬 "60 days?"🤷‍♀️ "We can’t wait that long."💬 "30 days?"❓ "Is it negotiable?"💬 "Immediate?"🤔 "Why did you leave without another offer?"It’s becoming harder to answer this simple question the “right” way.🔹 Everyone has different situations — some are serving notice, some are on break, some are ready to join.🔹 Let’s normalize understanding the context, not just the number of days.To all HR professionals and hiring managers: sometimes, a few extra days of waiting can bring in the right talent.And to fellow job seekers: stay patient, stay prepared, and keep going. 🔍 A quienes fueron descartados sin siquiera ser escuchados: este post es para ustedes.Te dijeron que “no encajabas”, que “buscaban otro perfil”, o simplemente no te dijeron nada.Ni siquiera llegaron a conocer tu experiencia, tu historia, tu valor real.Te juzgaron por un CV, por una foto, por una suposición.Pero tú sabes lo que sabes.Sabes lo que has vivido, lo que has resuelto, lo que has logrado incluso cuando nadie miraba. 🚨‼️ Stop falling for fake hiring posts‼️🚨It’s frustrating to see how many people still comment “Interested” under every so-called hiring update. Here’s the truth:Most of these posts are not about jobs — they’re about gaining followers, likes, and engagement.No legitimate company or startup will shortlist candidates based on who comments Interested. That’s not how real hiring works.It’s high time LinkedIn takes action against this trend — especially those fake posts where random images (often of women) are paired with vague “We’re hiring!” messages to bait reactions.Please, protect your time and energy. Be smart. Apply directly. Do your research. And let’s stop rewarding these engagement traps.hashtag#unemployedhashtag#copied Amarnath R MAmarnath R M 🚨‼️ Stop falling for fake hiring posts‼️🚨It’s frustrating to see how many people still comment “Interested” under every so-called hiring update. 🚫 Stop Falling for Fake Hiring Posts 🚫It’s time we address the growing number of misleading job posts circulating on LinkedIn.Too often, we see posts asking people to comment "Interested" — with no actual hiring intent. These are often just tactics to gain visibility and increase follower count, not genuine opportunities.📌 Let’s be clear:No serious company or startup will shortlist candidates just because they commented.Authentic recruitment happens through proper screening — not via posts with random photos and vague captions.👎 These posts waste time, spread false hope, and take advantage of job seekers.✅ Let’s stay focused on legitimate opportunities and support one another ethically and responsibly.🔍 LinkedIn must take action to identify and limit such deceptive content.Let’s make the platform safer and more professional for everyone.hashtag#FakeHiringhashtag#JobSearchhashtag#LinkedInTipshashtag#CareerGrowthhashtag#RecruitmentEthicshashtag#HR Nafeezzuddiin S MdNafeezzuddiin S Md 🚫 Stop Falling for Fake Hiring Posts 🚫It’s time we address the growing number of misleading job posts circulating on LinkedIn.Too often, we see posts asking people to comment "Interested" — with no actual hiring intent. 🛑 If you don’t understand the value of a Social Media Manager, you shouldn’t be hiring one.They’re not here to “just post.”They build brand trust in public.They handle firestorms with DMs.They turn content into community — in real time.You think it’s easy?Try being the voice of a brand that doesn’t even know what it stands for yet.A good SMM doesn’t need micromanagement.They need support.They need clear goals.They need you to stop treating them like an intern with Canva access.It’s Monday.Put respect on the role — or expect your brand to stay invisible.
